HowToAcknowledge:
Data in this repository has been used in multiple projects.
When using this dataset, please include the following message: 'This data was obtained from the OpenNeuro database under the accession number ds002634'.
,Please also reference the relevant data papers, as indicated in the README file, depending on which data you use.
ReferencesAndLinks: Eichert et al. 2020, Cerebral Cortex: https://doi.org/10.1093/cercor/bhaa182
